documents.document: Nothing annoys me more, on a night out, than getting charged 2 different prices for the same pint.
Social media is becoming so generic. Facebook and Instagram becoming Snapchat and Snapchat becoming a group messenger app
First fixtures of the year made, the season won't be long coming @RushCricketClub
Haven't gone to work yet and already can't wait to get home and go to bed
@cronin_barry ðŸ˜‚ I'll have to get ShowBox for my room alright, biding my time with Netflix before I get another box
@cronin_barry night ruined, Barry
Why does Netflix have Red Dragon, but not Silence of the Lambs or Hannibal. A prequel without both sequel movies? Who does that
You'd need to starve for a week to polish off a Rush Buster from Sammy's
@kingjameslad sure I would have drank it out of an old boot, if it was put in front of me
I'd rather a plastic cup over that
Can't believe I got a pint of Guinness in a Carlsberg glass last night
@_danielosborne similar situation I'm Applegreen last week so I looked at the Central Bank's website https://t.co/yMhUTcbJa2
@_danielosborne tell her to get lost, you don't have to count anything over 50 coins in a transaction
I'd go to an Aslan concert just to see and hear Christy sing and perform This Is, and Crazy World.
Seeing a clip of Aslan last night has me looking up their old songs. What a voice Christy Dignam has
@Rob_Costello may God have mercy on us all https://t.co/s49UVINYDG
@RushCricketClub I wouldn't darken the door again if they did
I hate nothing more than drinking Guinness out of a plastic cup.
I think I was the only person in Rush who didn't have a drink all weekend
The tripe that's on rte1, the most sexist comments I've ever heard from a woman #CuttingEdge
Have to try stop falling asleep on busses.
Tempted to bring my hip flask with me, haven't been golfing in ages
And then when it eventually shows up, only lets 2 people on. Oh my days
Only on the Dublin Bus app could 8 minutes turn into 26 minutes, and the bus still isn't here #joke
Who even does shots of tequila in The Drop of a Sunday
Trying to have a can of Monster and eat a 4in1 tray on the sly while serving a few customers. Please God don't make me burp at one of them
Trump has a cameo in Home Alone II, he has that going for him, I suppose. #ElectionNight #Trump
You deserve to be taken off and shot if you open a bus window 5 seconds after sitting down at this stage in November
@RickardLynn hope that was for the sake of playing devil's advocate
You need to evaluate your life if you come into a garage 11 on a Saturday morning looking drink, off your head on ketamine bragging about it
We only got 2 trick or treaters, now who has to eat all of the Halloween chocolate? ðŸ‘€
It's great to be off emergency tax already, although I would have liked to build up a little lump sum ðŸ˜‚
@dublinbusnews Are 33's still operating towards Lwr Abbey Street through Rush this morning?
16 hours work done in 24 hours. #LovelyShifts
@kristenburke20 I'm sure she'll stock up again ðŸ‘€
@kristenburke20 always the same when there's sweets on sale in the run up to Halloween ðŸ˜‚
@liam1costello what else would you be doing on your days off ðŸ˜‚
Don't know who my mam was trying to fool when she bought bars and chocolate last week and said they were for Halloween
My watch stopped while I was taking a delivery this morning, nothing better than finding out its an hour and a half later than you thought
Probably should have tried the suit on before now. Hope she still fits ðŸ˜‚ @RushCricketClub
I've been at 13 for too long, finally gained a shot back to 14. #HungoverGolf
After a 3 hour sleep, think it's time for a nap before golf
First leg day done after 3 odd years out of the gym. Thank God there's no stairs in the gaff
Not a fan of drinking on a Friday. Nearly always turns into a 2 day rollover #FriSatSun
You only realise how heavy-footed you jog when you start running a treadmill on an incline
@_danielosborne reading that felt like a Jerry Seinfeld bit
@coffey2k9 Sandra asked me to trim a few bushes for her
Landed myself a new job and joined the gym #productiveday #pints?
Already necked a stout, did a jagerbomb, orchard thieves and it's only 12:20
Do nothing at home all day, then decide to go for a jog at 10 at night
Forgot how good a film Old School is. #FrankTheTank
Can't believe the cricket season is over
Huge last game for the seconds today in Kenure. A win needed to guarantee promotion once and for all #SuperSeconds @RushCricketClub
The amount of cars that beep when I'm out painting the fence on the Whitestown Road is unbelievable
@kingjameslad sat down and had a cup of tea, I'd say getting back up will be a struggle ðŸ˜‚
No better feeling than hopping into the shower after a beach run
@kingjameslad ah it's head wrecking at times ðŸ˜‚
@kingjameslad ah there's nothing worse, woke up 3 times last night
@coffey2k9 @cricketleinster Leinster and Malahide awarded 12.5 points each for their tied game, I'd say
@enrobsoleinad Jesus a calippo sounds good
I haven't drank vodka like that in a long time.
Getting your first CAO choice isn't the end of the world. I got my first and probably wasted 2 years #CAO2016
How do I manage to get out of shoes without opening the laces, and jeans without opening the belt, when I'm hammered?!
Right, that's the last time I neck pints of Guinness. One way ticket to blackout city.
Feck it anyway, missed all 3 of Bolt's last Olympic winning runs
Perfect, especially seeing as though I've never been in taxable employment. https://t.co/49fjoR56pn
Now that's after making a mess of it all
I'm destined to fail this exam- my dad has taken the week off work and is cutting trees outside while I try to cram for only repeat
Probably the most miserable conditions I've played in, still a full point win for the 2s. 3 huge back to back wins #SuperSeconds
@coffey2k9 need to cut out the drinking on a Monday too
@coffey2k9 don't think I remember a single one of those sixes ðŸ˜‚
Rush close on 268-8. Middle order dug us out of a big hole yet again this weekend. Venter and Carthy both score 69 #cricketleinster #14336
Carthy still in with 57*, Usman out after a quick 34. Rush 223-6/38 #cricketleinster #14336
Venter falls for 69. Rush 156-5/39. Carthy still occupying the crease on 34 #cricketleinster #14336
Rush now 139-4 after 27. Jared Venter's first fifty for Rush (61*) with David Carthy 27* #cricketleinster #14336
22 point win for the 2s against second in the league. Important game tomorrow against league leaders, weekend only half way there
Hate looking at people walking around with bad sunburn, makes me cringe
What's up with every lad in Santa PonÃ§a walking around with man bags across their chest
@meganfoleyxo ah would you come off it
@meganfoleyxo head session moth alright ðŸ˜‚
@meganfoleyxo the answer is always to go out
Only out of bed about 3 hours and I need a nap
Hottest day of the year tomorrow and we're off to Spain. #typical
Military coup in Ankara, tanks on the streets and helicopters opening fire. What is the world coming to #TurkeyCoup
@RoisinMcCarthy_ Renault dealership where the new Costa is. Beside compu-b and champion
I know I haven't been in Swords for a while. But since when has there been a car dealership in the Pavilions
@gerardpkenny ah gerry, before a game ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
What a weekend that was- topped off with a run through Birmingham airport terminal, nearly certain we had missed our flight.
Don't think I'll be staying dry with the Irish match today, Facebook. #pints https://t.co/1ScErgiE0s
@RoisinMcCarthy_ dropping her daughter off for work and giving me a lift home, she even tried to give me Â£20 as I had no money
Here's to the woman who gave me a lift to the hotel this morning at 7:30 because she saw me walk around in circles for about 3 hours #birmo
Think John Delaney gave Michael D a heart attack with those celebrations
Irish fans have got the best reputation in the Euros so far..If the ref keeps this joke going the place might get broken up #OpenThemEyesRef
This cameraman is doing his best not to show us what is happening off the ball
Randolph is smooth as silk on the ball #EURO2016
Just played and lost my worst intra-club match against the same guy I played my worst inter-club competition with last week #golf #confusing
Cashback going in to the Life is a cruel mistress
No doubt I'll forget a charger for the iPad or laptop today, something bound to be left behind
My first time properly scoring the book in about 2 years, and D/L is almost a certainty. #ahgreat
Haven't had that many jagerbombs on a night out in a long time
